<title level="1" right="Action">[Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 471 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements** Your Speed is at least 10 feet.

</column>

---

You carefully move 5 feet. Unlike most types of movement, Stepping doesn't trigger reactions, such as [Attacks of Opportunity](/Actions.aspx?ID=8), that can be triggered by [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) actions or upon leaving or entering a square.

 You can't Step into [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453), and you can't Step using a Speed other than your land Speed.
